text: Abdelkader Harizi (born July 14, 1987, in Djendel) is an Algerian football player. He currently plays for MC El Eulma in the Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1. ==Club career== On January 7, 2010, it was announced that Harizi had signed a six-month contract with USM Blida, after spending five seasons with CR Belouizdad.CRB : Harizi opte pour Blida On April 14, 2010, he scored his first league goal for USM Blida in a 2-1 loss to ES Sétif.ESS 2-1 USMB ==References== ==External links== * DZFoot Profile * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:People from Aïn Defla Province Category:Algerian footballers Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 players Category:CR Belouizdad players Category:MC Oran players Category:USM Blida players Category:USMM Hadjout players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Abdelkader Harizi
